pages.about-us: JuicyHarvest - About Us: Our Story, Mission, and Team Home About Us Products Contacts JuicyHarvest E-MAIL: juicyharvest@gmail.com Freshness with Style Crafting the JuicyHarvest At JuicyHarvest, we are passionate about bringing you fruits that go beyond just taste, making a statement in freshness and quality. Our carefulfully curated selection combines premium cultivation with impeccable sourcing, ensuring that you not only enjoy delicious fruits but also experience the essence of nature's bounty. JuicyHarvest Legal Disclaimers All information found on this website, optistyle.com, is published in good faith and solely intended for general informational purposes. JuicyHarvest cannot guarantee the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of this information. Any actions you take based on the information presented on this website (JuicyHarvest) are entirely at your own risk. JuicyHarvest shall not be held responsible for any losses or damages incurred in connection with using our website. This website may contain hyperlinks that direct you to other external websites. While we make every effort to provide only high-quality links to valuable and ethical websites, we have no control over the content or nature of those sites. These links do not constitute an endorsement of all content found on these sites. The ownership and content of these websites can change without prior notice, and it's possible that we may not have the opportunity to remove a link that has become outdated or irrelevant. It's important to remember that when you leave our website, other sites may have their own privacy policies and terms of use that differ from ours and are beyond our control. Please ensure you review the Privacy Policies and Terms of Service of these websites before engaging in any business transactions or uploading any information. Consent By using our website, you implicitly agree to our legal disclaimer and its terms. Updates If we update, modify, or make any changes to this document, we will prominently display those changes here. pages.privacy-policy: JuicyHarvest - Privacy Policy: Data Collection, Usage, Security, and Transparency Home About Us Products Contacts JuicyHarvest E-MAIL: juicyharvest@gmail.com Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. It is JuicyHarvest's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, https://www.juicyharvest.com, and other sites we own and operate. We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used. We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law. Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies. You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services. Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us. This policy is effective as of 1 January 2024. The JuicyHarvest website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.terms-conditions: JuicyHarvest - Terms and Conditions: Policies, Privacy, Disclaimers, and Legal Notices Home About Us Products Contacts JuicyHarvest E-MAIL: juicyharvest@gmail.com Terms and Conditions Welcome to JuicyHarvest! These terms and conditions govern your use of the JuicyHarvest website, located at JuicyHarvest.com. By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use JuicyHarvest if you do not agree to all of the terms and conditions stated on this page. Cookies The website uses cookies to help personalize your online experience. By accessing JuicyHarvest, you agree to use the necessary cookies. A cookie is a text file that a web page server places on your hard drive. Cookies cannot be used to run programs or deliver viruses to your computer. Cookies are uniquely assigned to you and can only be read by a web server in the domain that issued the cookie to you. We may use cookies to collect, store, and track information for statistical or marketing purposes to operate our website. You have the ability to accept or decline optional cookies. There are some necessary cookies that are essential for the operation of our website. These cookies do not require your consent, as they always work. Please keep in mind that by accepting necessary cookies, you also accept third-party cookies, which may be used through services provided by third parties if you use such services on our website, for example, a video display window provided by a third party and integrated into our website. License Unless otherwise stated, JuicyHarvest and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on JuicyHarvest. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this material on JuicyHarvest for your own personal use, subject to the restrictions set in these terms and conditions. You must not: Copy or republish material from JuicyHarvest Sell, rent, or sub-license material from JuicyHarvest Reproduce, duplicate, or copy material from JuicyHarvest Redistribute content from JuicyHarvest This Agreement will commence on the date hereof. Certain parts of this website offer users the opportunity to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. JuicyHarvest does not filter, edit, publish, or review Comments before their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of JuicyHarvest, its agents, and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who posts their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, JuicyHarvest will not be responsible for any comments or for any liability, damages, or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use and/or posting and/or appearance of the comments on this website. JuicyHarvest reserves the right to monitor all Comments and remove any Comment that may be considered inappropriate, offensive, or that causes a breach of these Terms and Conditions. You warrant and represent that: You have the right to post Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so; The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including, without limitation, copyright, patent, or trademark of any third party; The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent, or illegal material, which is an invasion of privacy. The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business, custom, or present commercial activities or illegal activities. You grant JuicyHarvest a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit, and authorize others to use, reproduce, and edit any of your Comments in all forms, formats, or media.
